page.title: 07Farming in General
page.content: Nowadays farming is very complex.To be a good farmer is to be a good business man.This area takes in eight farms.The total acreage comes to 1530 acres with the main crops being Barley,Potatoes and Grass.There are 350 beef cattle, 100 dairy cattle,650 sheep and 10,000 chickens. Each farm is very different and so are the farmers.These are small farms which are difficult to run profitably. One farmer operates as an agricultural contractor and the others combine with each other or other farms to operate as larger units.These farmers all love their farms and will do anything to keep them going.As one farmer commented farmers have been around for 12,000 years and should be around for at least another 12,000!
